description: Row 1 of A018219, i.e. (1,n,a_n) is a winning position.
comments: Self-inverse when considered as a permutation or function, i.e. a(a(n)) = n.
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
author: _Michael Kleber_
extensions: Edited and extended by _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 29 2002
